name: Bitter Klondike
description:
Created in 12 hours using this tilesheet https://reddashgames.itch.io/bitterjam-01-tileset. Planned as BitterJam submission, got a little late. Everything is aligned at 8x8 grid, no tiles are overlapping (all challenges done).

Foundation piles are pre-determined left to right: Hearts, "Diamonds" (Suns), Clubs, Spades. Double tap (or right click) to quickly send card to foundation pile.
